column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A man apparently very drunk drove an Indian style tuk tuk into light pole
column4: causing himself serious injuries.------The incident happened at 9:30 pm on August 19
column5: 2020 along the concrete road in Sangkat Stung Meanchey II
column7: Phnom Penh.------Sources from the people said that before the incident
